title: Speed, Distance, Time Calculator – Solve for Any Variable

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \( v = \dfrac{d}{t}, \quad d = v \cdot t, \quad t = \dfrac{d}{v} \) where \(v\) is speed, \(d\) is distance, and \(t\) is time.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Convert 30 minutes to hours: \( 30 \text{ min} = 0.5 \text{ h} \). \( d = v \cdot t = 12 \text{ km/h} \times 0.5 \text{ h} = 6 \text{ km}. \)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \( t = \dfrac{d}{v} = \dfrac{35 \text{ km}}{20 \text{ km/h}} = 1.75 \text{ h} \approx 1 \text{ h } 45 \text{ min}. \)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
